trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> objects within a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件设计器中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class and any derived class defines the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类和任何派生的类定义<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>属性作为<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>对象。

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property in a derived control designer, add custom automatic formatting styles, and return the collection of supported formats to the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: 控件开发人员可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>属性在派生的控件设计器中，添加自定义自动格式设置样式，并返回到可视化设计器的受支持格式的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection dynamically increases as objects are added.
trans-unit.target: 添加对象时，集合将动态增加。

trans-unit.source: Indexes in this collection are zero-based.
trans-unit.target: 在此集合中的索引是从零开始。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Count%2A> property to determine how many automatic style formats are in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Count%2A>属性以确定集合中有多少自动样式格式。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> methods and properties to provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: 此外，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>方法和属性，以提供以下功能：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Add%2A> method to add a single format to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Add%2A>方法将一种格式添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Insert%2A> method to add a format at a particular index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Insert%2A>方法来在集合中的特定索引处添加一种格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove a format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Remove%2A>方法来删除一种格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove the format at a particular index.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法移除特定索引处的格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether a particular format is already in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Contains%2A>方法来确定特定的格式是否已在集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to retrieve the index of a format within the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法来检索集合中的格式的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Item%2A> property to get or set the format at a particular index, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Item%2A>属性来获取或设置使用数组表示法的特定索引处的格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all formats from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Clear%2A>方法从集合中移除所有格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Count%2A> property to determine the number of formats in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Count%2A>属性以确定集合中的格式的数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to get the position of a format within the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法以获取集合中的格式的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property in a custom control designer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>在自定义控件设计器中的属性。

trans-unit.source: The derived control designer implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property by adding three instances of a custom automatic format that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: 派生的控件设计器实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>通过添加派生自的自定义自动格式的三个实例的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> constructor to create an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>构造函数来创建一个空集合。

trans-unit.source: You can add elements to the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将元素添加到集合中使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> 对象添加到集合末尾。

trans-unit.source: The index at which the format was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中添加了格式的位置的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Add%2A> method adds the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Add%2A>方法将添加指定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>到集合末尾的对象。

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object to the collection at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>对象添加到在特定索引位置，请使用收藏<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to create and add <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> objects to the `AutoFormats` property of a custom designer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建并添加<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>对象添加到`AutoFormats`的自定义设计器的属性。

trans-unit.source: Removes all formats from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除所有格式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all formats from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Clear%2A>方法从集合中移除所有格式。

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific format from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从集合中移除特定的格式，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Remove%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove a format at a particular index, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除特定索引处的格式，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified format is contained within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定格式是否包含在集合中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the specified format is in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合中存在指定的格式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Contains%2A> method determines equality by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> objects that are being compared.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Contains%2A>方法通过使用来确定相等性<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>要比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> 对象的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> 对象的数目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Count%2A> property typically is used to determine the upper boundary index when iterating through objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Count%2A>属性通常用于确定上限索引，当循环访问集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Because the collection indexes are zero-based, the first element is at index `0` and the last element is at index `Count-1`.
trans-unit.target: 集合索引是从零开始的因为第一个元素是在索引`0`和最后一个元素是在索引`Count-1`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> to locate within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中定位的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> 对象在集合中的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="format" /> within the collection; otherwise, -1, if the format is not in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中 <paramref name="format" /> 的第一个匹配项从零开始的索引；如果格式不在集合中，则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.IndexOf%2A> method determines equality by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> objects that are being compared.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法通过使用来确定相等性<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>要比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index within the collection at which to insert <c>format</c>.
trans-unit.target: 集合中从零开始的索引，在此处插入 <c>format</c>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要插入到集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> object into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> 对象插入到集合中的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Insert%2A> method adds a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object to the collection at a specific index location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Insert%2A>方法将添加<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>到集合中的特定索引位置处的对象。

trans-unit.source: To add a single <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> to the end of the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加单个<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>到集合的末尾，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When you insert an item into a collection, the index values change for subsequent items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将某个项插入到集合，集合中的后续项的索引值更改。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Count" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大于 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Count" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> to get or set in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中获取或设置的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> 的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置集合中指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 位于集合中指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Item%2A> indexer to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object at the specified index within the collection or to set the format at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Item%2A>索引器以检索<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>集合中，或要在集合中的指定索引处设置格式的指定索引处的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can index elements in the collection by using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用数组表示法索引集合中的元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can index an element at index `i` with the notation `AutoFormats(i)` for Microsoft VisualBasic or `AutoFormats[i]` for C#.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以编制索引处的元素索引`i`使用记数法`AutoFormats(i)`为 Microsoft visual Basic 或`AutoFormats[i]`对于 C#。

trans-unit.source: When you have a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object and need the index of the object in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你具有对引用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>对象，并需要在集合中，使用对象的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Count" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大于 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Count" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum outer dimensions of the control as it will appear at run time.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件将在运行时显示的最大外部尺寸。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure that contains the height and width of the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 包含设计图面上的控件的高度和宽度的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.PreviewSize%2A> property examines each format in the collection and returns the largest height and the largest width in a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> structure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.PreviewSize%2A>属性检查集合中的每种格式，然后返回的最大高度和中的最大宽度<xref:System.Drawing.Size>结构。

trans-unit.source: A visual designer, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.PreviewSize%2A> to determine the initial size of the **AutoFormat** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 可视设计器，如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.PreviewSize%2A>来确定的初始大小**AutoFormat**对话框。

trans-unit.source: The minimum size is 200-by-200 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 最小大小为 200 的 200 像素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从该集合中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Remove%2A> method removes the first occurrence of `format` from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Remove%2A>方法移除的第一个匹配项`format`从集合。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object does not contain `format`, the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>对象不包含`format`，集合保持不变。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Remove%2A> method determines equality by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> objects that are being compared.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Remove%2A>方法通过使用来确定相等性<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>要比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Remove%2A> method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Count%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Remove%2A>方法执行线性搜索; 因此，平均执行时间成比例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Count%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: To remove a format at a particular index from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从集合中移除特定索引处的格式，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove all formats from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从集合中移除所有格式，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When you remove an item from a collection, the index values change for subsequent items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 当从集合中移除项时，索引值更改为集合中的后续项。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从集合中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> 的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> object at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除集合中指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove a format at a particular index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法从集合中移除特定索引处的格式。

trans-unit.source: To remove a specified format from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从集合中移除指定的格式，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Remove%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove all formats from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从集合中移除所有格式，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When you remove an item from a collection, the index values change for subsequent items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 当从集合中移除项时，索引值更改为集合中的后续项。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Count" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大于 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.Count" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 对象的访问。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is not a thread-safe procedure intrinsically.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合不是一个线程安全的过程本质上。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合。

trans-unit.source: This causes exceptions during enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 这会枚举过程中导致异常。

trans-unit.source: Lock the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.SyncRoot%2A> method during the entire enumeration to guarantee thread safety.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用锁定集合<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection.SyncRoot%2A>若要确保线程安全性在整个枚举期间的方法。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about locking collections for thread-safe access, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关线程安全的访问的锁定集合的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to receive the designated items.
trans-unit.target: 要接收指定项的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting index for the items to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的项的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection to an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object, starting at a particular <see cref="T:System.Array" /> index when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object is cast to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 对象被强制转换为 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 接口时，从特定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 索引开始将集合的元素复制到一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements that are contained in the collection when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object is cast to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 获取当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 对象强制转换为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 接口时包含在集合中的元素的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中项的数目。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe) when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object is cast to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 对象强制转换为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 接口时对集合的访问是否同步（线程安全）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> is synchronized; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 已同步，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>对象强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> interface that iterates through the collection when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object is cast to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 接口，该接口在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 对象被强制转换为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 接口时循环访问该集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 的一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>对象强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the collection when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object is cast to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 对象被强制转换为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 接口时向该集合添加一个项。

trans-unit.source: The index of the added item.
trans-unit.target: 所添加的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>对象强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.IList>接口。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the collection contains a specific value when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object is cast to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 对象被强制转换为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 接口时，确定该集合是否包含某个特定的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the object is in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>对象强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.IList>接口。

trans-unit.source: The value.
trans-unit.target: 值。

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specific item in the collection when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object is cast to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 对象被强制转换为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 接口时，确定该集合中特定项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of a item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中某项的索引。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The index at which to insert <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在该处插入 <c>value</c> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the collection at the specified index when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object is cast to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 对象被强制转换为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 接口时，在该集合中的指定索引处插入一个项。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection has a fixed size when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object is cast to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 对象强制转换为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 接口时集合是否具有固定大小。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 总是为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>对象强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.IList>接口。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this method, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此方法的说明，请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />, which indicates that the collection cannot be replaced or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 始终为 <see langword="true" />，指示无法替换或删除集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=nameWithType> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The index.
trans-unit.target: 索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element at the specified index when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object is cast to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 对象被强制转换为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 接口时，获取指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>对象强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.IList>接口。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the collection when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object is cast to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 对象被强制转换为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 接口时，移除特定对象在集合中的第一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the item at the specified index when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object is cast to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 对象被强制转换为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 接口时，移除指定索引处的项。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。
